gov.anl.ipns.ViewTools.Components.ViewControls
Class ControlCheckboxSpinner

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent

                  gov.anl.ipns.ViewTools.UI.ActiveJPanel

                              gov.anl.ipns.ViewTools.Components.ViewControls.ControlCheckboxSpinner
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPreserveState, IViewControl, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class ControlCheckboxSpinner
extends CheckedControl

This is a control that has a checkbox with a spinner next to it. When, the checkbox is checked/unchecked the spinner is enabled/disabled.

See Also:
Serialized Form

ControlCheckboxSpinner

public ControlCheckboxSpinner(java.lang.String con_title,
                              boolean isChecked,
                              java.lang.String label,
                              javax.swing.SpinnerModel model,
                              java.lang.Object defaultVal,
                              java.lang.Object initialVal)
Creates the control with a label based on the specified parameters.

Parameters:
con_title - The title of the control.
isChecked - True if the control should have its checkbox checked and false if it shouldn't.
label - The label displayed on the control.
model - The model that handles the values maintained by the spinner.
defaultVal - The spinner's default value.
initialVal - The spinner's initial value.

isSpinnerEditable

public boolean isSpinnerEditable()
Used to determine if the textfield showing the spinner's value is directly editable by the user.

Returns:
True if the spinner's value is directly editable by the user and false if it isn't.

setSpinnerEditable

public void setSpinnerEditable(boolean editable)
The spinner has a textfield that shows its current value. This method is used to set if the user should be able to directly modify this textfield.

Parameters:
editable - True if the user should be directly able to modify the spinner's value and false if he/she shouldn't be.

setSpinnerEnabled

public void setSpinnerEnabled(boolean enabled)
Used to enable/disable the spinner on this control.

Parameters:
enabled - True to enable the spinner and false to disable it.

Testbed. Opens a JFrame displaying this control.

Parameters:
args - Unused.
